title: Locally resolvable BIBDs and generalized quadrangles with ovoids
abstract:
In this note we establish a 1-to-1 correspondence between the class of
generalized quadrangles with ovoids and the class of balanced incomplete block
designs that posses a non-triangular local resolution system and have the
appropriate parameters. We present a non-triangular local resolution system for
a difference family BIBD construction of Sprott.
